title: Random NMS Words
description:
This project gives you a random word from the NMS dictionary. It's a great way to learn new words and expand your vocabulary.
It's intended to be used with a 3D-printed Knowledge Stone

title: Pyramid Display
description: Create the illusion of holograms using the Pepper's Ghost technique and this website.

title: Homepage
description: This is the webpage you're currently on. It's a simple homepage with links to my projects.
